title: Crypto sidelined for Super Bowl as industry titans pull back on ad play
description: As preparations for Super Bowl LVIII go into full swing, cryptocurrency companies are reportedly scaling back on exposure, with a majority opting out of advertising during the much-anticipated event.

title: Sega changes game plan, embraces blockchain ventures after sales dip
description: Sega's exploration of blockchain technology, marked by its partnership with Double Jump Tokyo, is part of a broader industry trend toward embracing web3.
